citation: Proclamation under the Evidence Amendment Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Evidence Amendment Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Evidence Amendment Act 1997 fix 28 January 1998 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 January 1998

G.S.M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

R.J. GROOM

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 January 1998

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
